Pain is a complex phenomenon with which many have to deal with on a daily basis. Often misunderstood and seldom local. It can present dissociatively, behave irratiaclly and is as ilusive to diagnose as it is stuborn to treat.

Dr. Louis Smit

Professional background

Dr. Louis Smit is an internationally qualified and experience specialist in the field. After completing his undergraduate studies locally, he practiced in Canada, before returning to further his expertise in aneasthetics.

He cemented his education by completing his Fellowship in Interventional pain at the renowned World Institute of Pain in the Netherlands.

Personal journey

Dr. Smit has also been personally affected by the effects of pain and illness and personally knows the road towards returing succesfully and hapily to everyday life.

Helderberg Pain Clinic has built a reputation on understanding, defining and managing the field of pain. We are experts at seeing pain hollistically and solving underlying problems rather than treating superficial

Diagnosis

From narrowing in on the point of pain, to identifying root causes and lifestyle contributers

Treatment

Hollistic approach to applying the latest advancements in pain management and treatment

Rehabilitation

Ensuring long term relief and walking the road to recovery together

Treatment Options

The Helderberg pain Clinic provides a wide range of options when it comes to dealing with all types of pain. We help guide patients to the most appropriate treatment for the cause and stage of their condition.
